build.script:
#!/bin/sh
cd ./src/fpga
sed 's/ /\n/g' ./core/pipelinec_output_uxn.c_1/vhdl_files.txt > ./core/pipelinec_output_uxn.c_1/vhdl_files_adj.txt
sed -i '' 's/\/workdir\//set_global_assignment\ -name\ VHDL_FILE core\//g' ./core/pipelinec_output_uxn.c_1/vhdl_files_adj.txt
sed -i '' '/VHDL_FILE\ core\/pipelinec_output_uxn/d' ap_core.qsf
cat ./core/pipelinec_output_uxn.c_1/vhdl_files_adj.txt >> ap_core.qsf
docker run --platform linux/amd64 -t --rm -v $(pwd):/build 53500e0665a3 quartus_sh --flow compile ap_core.qpf

clean.script:
#!/bin/sh
cd ./src/fpga

# sed -i '/^"set_global_assignment -name VHDL_FILE core/pipelinec_output_uxn"/d' ap_core.qsf
# set_global_assignment -name VHDL_FILE core/pipelinec_output_uxn
docker run --platform linux/amd64 -t --rm -v $(pwd):/build 53500e0665a3 quartus_sh --clean ap_core.qpf
